extends TaxonCommandRunner

        public void purgeSolr(Opts opts)

      • generalLoadOntologySolr

        public void generalLoadOntologySolr(Opts opts)
                             throws Exception
        Trivial hard-wired (and optional) method for loading collected ontology information into the "general" schema (general-config.yaml) for GO. This is a very dumb, but easy to understand, loader.
        Parameters:
        opts -
        Throws:
        Exception

      • processPantherTrees

        public void processPantherTrees(Opts opts)
                         throws Exception
        Used for applying the panther trees to the currently data run. This must be run before the command is given to load a GAF. The first argument in the list is for PANTHER7.2_HMM_classifications or whatever it will be called. The rest are for directories that contain the actual PANTHER trees.
        Parameters:
        opts -
        Throws:
        Exception

      • optimizeSolr

        public void optimizeSolr(Opts opts)
                  throws Exception
        Requires the --solr-url argument. Ignoring necessity, sends the optimize to the Solr index. I hope you have double the space!
        Parameters:
        opts -
        Throws:
        Exception

      • dumpShuntGraphs

        public void dumpShuntGraphs(Opts opts)
                     throws Exception
        Used for generating output for units tests in other languages. Output some JSON graph serializations. NOTE: In order to cut down on clutter, this method depends on relative resources in the test/resources. This may change later on--be warned.
        Parameters:
        opts -
        Throws:
        Exception
